Odoo Report Linker - Enhance Your Odoo Development Workflow

Overview:
Odoo Report Linker is a powerful Chrome extension designed for Odoo developers to streamline the report preview process. Whether you're working with base reports or custom report templates, this tool eliminates the need for constant module upgrades or reprints during development. With Odoo Report Linker, you can instantly generate and open PDF report links directly in your browser, saving valuable time and effort.

Key Features:
1. Instant PDF Report Generation: Generate and preview PDF reports in Odoo without downloading or printing. Simply input the necessary details, and your report is ready to view.
2. Localhost & Live Server Compatibility: Seamlessly switch between localhost and live server environments with dedicated fields for each. Whether youâ€™re testing on a local server or deploying on a live site, Odoo Report Linker adapts to your needs.
3. User-Friendly Interface: The extension offers an intuitive and easy-to-navigate interface, with clearly labeled fields for localhost port, module name, report action ID, and record ID.
4. Dynamic Field Management: The extension intelligently toggles required fields based on your server selection, ensuring you only input what's necessary for your current environment.
5. One-Click Access: Generate your report link with a single click and open it directly in a new tab, making your Odoo development process faster and more efficient.
6. Customizable Shortcut: Quickly open the Odoo Report Linker extension using the customizable keyboard shortcut (default: Ctrl+Shift+Y for Windows or Command+Shift+Y for Mac).
7. No Need for --dev=all: Run the Odoo server with --dev=all only once, and enjoy uninterrupted usage of the extension throughout your development process.

Why Use Odoo Report Linker?
1. Save Time: Eliminate the repetitive steps of module upgrades and reprints. Focus on developing and refining your reports instead of navigating through cumbersome processes.
2. Increase Productivity: By simplifying the report generation process, Odoo Report Linker allows you to dedicate more time to coding and less time to logistics.
3. Simplified Testing: Whether you're making minor adjustments or testing major changes, Odoo Report Linker ensures you can see the results instantly, providing a smoother development experience.

Ideal For:
1. Odoo Developers: Perfect for developers working on Odoo reports who need a quick and efficient way to preview their changes.
2. Development Teams: Teams can standardize their report testing process, reducing the margin for errors and improving workflow efficiency.
3. Freelancers & Agencies: Enhance your development services with faster report previews, delivering more value to your clients.

How It Works:
1. Install the Odoo Report Linker extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Open the extension from your browser toolbar.
3. Select your environment (Localhost or Live Server).
4. Enter the required details such as port number, module name, report action ID, and record ID.
5. Click "Generate Report Link" to instantly view your PDF report in a new tab.

Installation Guide:
Step 1: Download the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Step 2: Pin the extension to your toolbar for easy access.
Step 3: Follow the on-screen prompts to configure your settings and start using Odoo Report Linker.

Conclusion:
Odoo Report Linker is an indispensable tool for Odoo developers who want to streamline their workflow, save time, and increase productivity. Whether you're a solo developer or part of a larger team, this extension will make your report generation process simpler and more efficient.
